title: Coca-Cola teams up with Korean boy band BTS in limited-edition collection | South China Morning Post
text: Each of the seven members of Korean boy band BTS will appear on Coca-Cola bottles and cans in a limited-edition collection. The seven are RM, Suga, Jin, J-hope, Jimin, V and Jungkook. Their likenesses with their facial expressions and gestures will appear on plastic bottles and cans. Coca -Cola put together BTS and Korean heartthrob Park Bo-gum as models for this year’s summer campaign, using them in TV and billboard advertisements.
